# Privacy Policy

#### Information We Collect

Information we collect includes both information you actively provide us when
using our services and any application usage data collected automatically.

#### Log Data

When you visit our website, our servers may automatically log the standard
data provided by your web browser.

It may include your device’s IP address,
your browser type and version, the pages you visit, the time and date of your
visit, other details about your visit, and technical details that occur in
conjunction with any errors you may encounter.

#### Personal Information

If you create an Insight Maker account, we may ask for personal information
which may include your email and other personal information.

#### Collection and Use of Information

We may collect and use information for the following purposes:

  * to enable you to access and use our services
  * to enable you to customize or personalize your experience
  * to contact and communicate with you
  * for data analysis and research, including to operate and improve our services
  * for security and fraud prevention, and to ensure that our services are safe, secure, and used in line with our terms of use

#### Security of Your Personal Information

When we collect and process personal information, and while we retain this
information, we will protect it within commercially acceptable means to
prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying,
use, or modification.

#### Children’s Privacy

We do not aim any of our products or services directly at children under the
age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information about children
under 13.
sharing:

Insights and make them public, potentially personally identifiable information
like your account display name will be shown on their public listings.
